item.title: Implementing Webmention on a static website
item.description: On my first blog post, I mentioned that my first project for this website is to experiment with some technologies from the Indieweb. The technology that attracted me the most is Webmention. In this article, I will first elaborate on what are webmentions. Then, I will explain how to send them. Finally, I will show the different ways to receive them when using a static website. What is Webmention? Webmention is a web standard that allows having interactions in a decentralized way.

item.description: Hello people! This is Deluvi speaking. Welcome to my first blog post! I have been inspired by the Indieweb movement to make my own website. I really like their ideas of owning our own data and content and not letting companies owning them for convenience’s sake, since it can be as simple to share on our own website with the help of modern tooling. In this first blog post, I will share my current setup of this static website.
